page.title: 07 FARMING CROPS 2
page.content: The main crop that R.Caudwell (Farms) Ltd is Wheat with 565 hectares growing in the fields in 1985,followed by Barley with 158 hectares growing in the fields in 1985.They also grow Sugar Beet-115 hectares, Rape for Oilseed-110 hectares, Potatoes-61 hectares.The potato harvest spans from July to September.In the earlier part of the season the potatoes are lifted and bagged off the field and sold on a day to basis to several merchants mainly for the Manchester markets.Other crops for freezing are Peas, Cauliflowers and Brussel Sprouts.
